IP.Name: TOUCHSENSING
IP.About: TOUCHSENSING: a free source code library written in C allowing designers familiar with the use of standard microcontrollers to create higher-end human interfaces by replacing conventional electromechanical switches by capacitive sensors.

Condition.Expression: STM32L1 & !(STM32L151C6Tx | STM32L151C6TxA | STM32L151C6Ux | STM32L151C6UxA | STM32L151C8Tx | STM32L151C8TxA | STM32L151C8Ux | STM32L151C8UxA | STM32L151CBTx | STM32L151CBTxA | STM32L151CBUx | STM32L151CBUxA | STM32L151R6Hx | STM32L151R6HxA | STM32L151R6Tx | STM32L151R6TxA | STM32L151R8Hx | STM32L151R8HxA | STM32L151R8Tx | STM32L151R8TxA | STM32L151RBHx | STM32L151RBHxA | STM32L151RBTx | STM32L151RBTxA | STM32L151V8Hx | STM32L151V8HxA | STM32L151V8Tx | STM32L151V8TxA | STM32L151VBHx | STM32L151VBHxA | STM32L151VBTx | STM32L151VBTxA | STM32L152C6Tx | STM32L152C6TxA | STM32L152C6Ux | STM32L152C6UxA | STM32L152C8Tx | STM32L152C8TxA | STM32L152C8Ux | STM32L152C8UxA | STM32L152CBTx | STM32L152CBTxA | STM32L152CBUx | STM32L152CBUxA | STM32L152R6Hx | STM32L152R6HxA | STM32L152R6Tx | STM32L152R6TxA | STM32L152R8Hx | STM32L152R8HxA | STM32L152R8Tx | STM32L152R8TxA | STM32L152RBHx | STM32L152RBHxA | STM32L152RBTx | STM32L152RBTxA | STM32L152V8Hx | STM32L152V8HxA | STM32L152V8Tx | STM32L152V8TxA | STM32L152VBHx | STM32L152VBHxA | STM32L152VBTx | STM32L152VBTxA)

STM32L1 & (STM32L151C6Tx | STM32L151C6TxA | STM32L151C6Ux | STM32L151C6UxA | STM32L151C8Tx | STM32L151C8TxA | STM32L151C8Ux | STM32L151C8UxA | STM32L151CBTx | STM32L151CBTxA | STM32L151CBUx | STM32L151CBUxA | STM32L151R6Hx | STM32L151R6HxA | STM32L151R6Tx | STM32L151R6TxA | STM32L151R8Hx | STM32L151R8HxA | STM32L151R8Tx | STM32L151R8TxA | STM32L151RBHx | STM32L151RBHxA | STM32L151RBTx | STM32L151RBTxA | STM32L151V8Hx | STM32L151V8HxA | STM32L151V8Tx | STM32L151V8TxA | STM32L151VBHx | STM32L151VBHxA | STM32L151VBTx | STM32L151VBTxA | STM32L152C6Tx | STM32L152C6TxA | STM32L152C6Ux | STM32L152C6UxA | STM32L152C8Tx | STM32L152C8TxA | STM32L152C8Ux | STM32L152C8UxA | STM32L152CBTx | STM32L152CBTxA | STM32L152CBUx | STM32L152CBUxA | STM32L152R6Hx | STM32L152R6HxA | STM32L152R6Tx | STM32L152R6TxA | STM32L152R8Hx | STM32L152R8HxA | STM32L152R8Tx | STM32L152R8TxA | STM32L152RBHx | STM32L152RBHxA | STM32L152RBTx | STM32L152RBTxA | STM32L152V8Hx | STM32L152V8HxA | STM32L152V8Tx | STM32L152V8TxA | STM32L152VBHx | STM32L152VBHxA | STM32L152VBTx | STM32L152VBTxA)

RefParameter.Name: TSLPRM_TOTAL_CHANNELS_DEFAULT
RefParameter.DefaultValue: =(TSLPRM_TOTAL_TOUCHKEYS + TSLPRM_TOTAL_TOUCHKEYS_B + 3*(IF(TSLPRM_USE_3CH_LIN_M1,TSLPRM_USE_3CH_LIN_M1_NBR + TSLPRM_USE_3CH_LIN_M1_B_NBR,0) + IF(TSLPRM_USE_3CH_LIN_M2,TSLPRM_USE_3CH_LIN_M2_NBR + TSLPRM_USE_3CH_LIN_M2_B_NBR,0) + IF(TSLPRM_USE_3CH_LIN_H,TSLPRM_USE_3CH_LIN_H_NBR + TSLPRM_USE_3CH_LIN_H_B_NBR,0) + IF(TSLPRM_USE_3CH_ROT_M,TSLPRM_USE_3CH_ROT_M_NBR + TSLPRM_USE_3CH_ROT_M_B_NBR,0)) + 4*(IF(TSLPRM_USE_4CH_LIN_M1,TSLPRM_USE_4CH_LIN_M1_NBR + TSLPRM_USE_4CH_LIN_M1_B_NBR,0) + IF(TSLPRM_USE_4CH_LIN_M2,TSLPRM_USE_4CH_LIN_M2_NBR + TSLPRM_USE_4CH_LIN_M2_B_NBR,0) + IF(TSLPRM_USE_4CH_LIN_H,TSLPRM_USE_4CH_LIN_H_NBR + TSLPRM_USE_4CH_LIN_H_B_NBR,0) + IF(TSLPRM_USE_4CH_ROT_M,TSLPRM_USE_4CH_ROT_M_NBR + TSLPRM_USE_4CH_ROT_M_B_NBR,0)) + 5*(IF(TSLPRM_USE_5CH_LIN_M1,TSLPRM_USE_5CH_LIN_M1_NBR + TSLPRM_USE_5CH_LIN_M1_B_NBR,0) + IF(TSLPRM_USE_5CH_LIN_M2,TSLPRM_USE_5CH_LIN_M2_NBR + TSLPRM_USE_5CH_LIN_M2_B_NBR,0) + IF(TSLPRM_USE_5CH_LIN_H,TSLPRM_USE_5CH_LIN_H_NBR + TSLPRM_USE_5CH_LIN_H_B_NBR,0) + IF(TSLPRM_USE_5CH_ROT_M,TSLPRM_USE_5CH_ROT_M_NBR + TSLPRM_USE_5CH_ROT_M_B_NBR,0) + IF(TSLPRM_USE_5CH_ROT_D,TSLPRM_USE_5CH_ROT_D_NBR + TSLPRM_USE_5CH_ROT_D_B_NBR,0)) + 6*(IF(TSLPRM_USE_6CH_LIN_M1,TSLPRM_USE_6CH_LIN_M1_NBR + TSLPRM_USE_6CH_LIN_M1_B_NBR,0) + IF(TSLPRM_USE_6CH_LIN_M2,TSLPRM_USE_6CH_LIN_M2_NBR + TSLPRM_USE_6CH_LIN_M2_B_NBR,0) + IF(TSLPRM_USE_6CH_LIN_H,TSLPRM_USE_6CH_LIN_H_NBR + TSLPRM_USE_6CH_LIN_H_B_NBR,0) + IF(TSLPRM_USE_6CH_ROT_M,TSLPRM_USE_6CH_ROT_M_NBR + TSLPRM_USE_6CH_ROT_M_B_NBR,0)))
RefParameter.Description: Formula calculation for TSLPRM_TOTAL_CHANNELS default value.

RefParameter.Name: TSLPRM_TOTAL_CHANNELS_DEFAULT
RefParameter.DefaultValue: =(TSLPRM_TOTAL_TOUCHKEYS + TSLPRM_TOTAL_TOUCHKEYS_B + 3*(IF(TSLPRM_USE_3CH_LIN_M1,TSLPRM_USE_3CH_LIN_M1_NBR + TSLPRM_USE_3CH_LIN_M1_B_NBR,0) + IF(TSLPRM_USE_3CH_LIN_M2,TSLPRM_USE_3CH_LIN_M2_NBR + TSLPRM_USE_3CH_LIN_M2_B_NBR,0) + IF(TSLPRM_USE_3CH_LIN_H,TSLPRM_USE_3CH_LIN_H_NBR + TSLPRM_USE_3CH_LIN_H_B_NBR,0) + IF(TSLPRM_USE_3CH_ROT_M,TSLPRM_USE_3CH_ROT_M_NBR + TSLPRM_USE_3CH_ROT_M_B_NBR,0)) + 4*(IF(TSLPRM_USE_4CH_LIN_M1,TSLPRM_USE_4CH_LIN_M1_NBR + TSLPRM_USE_4CH_LIN_M1_B_NBR,0) + IF(TSLPRM_USE_4CH_LIN_M2,TSLPRM_USE_4CH_LIN_M2_NBR + TSLPRM_USE_4CH_LIN_M2_B_NBR,0) + IF(TSLPRM_USE_4CH_LIN_H,TSLPRM_USE_4CH_LIN_H_NBR + TSLPRM_USE_4CH_LIN_H_B_NBR,0) + IF(TSLPRM_USE_4CH_ROT_M,TSLPRM_USE_4CH_ROT_M_NBR + TSLPRM_USE_4CH_ROT_M_B_NBR,0)) + 5*(IF(TSLPRM_USE_5CH_LIN_M1,TSLPRM_USE_5CH_LIN_M1_NBR + TSLPRM_USE_5CH_LIN_M1_B_NBR,0) + IF(TSLPRM_USE_5CH_LIN_M2,TSLPRM_USE_5CH_LIN_M2_NBR + TSLPRM_USE_5CH_LIN_M2_B_NBR,0) + IF(TSLPRM_USE_5CH_LIN_H,TSLPRM_USE_5CH_LIN_H_NBR + TSLPRM_USE_5CH_LIN_H_B_NBR,0) + IF(TSLPRM_USE_5CH_ROT_M,TSLPRM_USE_5CH_ROT_M_NBR + TSLPRM_USE_5CH_ROT_M_B_NBR,0) + IF(TSLPRM_USE_5CH_ROT_D,TSLPRM_USE_5CH_ROT_D_NBR + TSLPRM_USE_5CH_ROT_D_B_NBR,0)) + 6*(IF(TSLPRM_USE_6CH_LIN_M1,TSLPRM_USE_6CH_LIN_M1_NBR + TSLPRM_USE_6CH_LIN_M1_B_NBR,0) + IF(TSLPRM_USE_6CH_LIN_M2,TSLPRM_USE_6CH_LIN_M2_NBR + TSLPRM_USE_6CH_LIN_M2_B_NBR,0) + IF(TSLPRM_USE_6CH_LIN_H,TSLPRM_USE_6CH_LIN_H_NBR + TSLPRM_USE_6CH_LIN_H_B_NBR,0) + IF(TSLPRM_USE_6CH_ROT_M,TSLPRM_USE_6CH_ROT_M_NBR + TSLPRM_USE_6CH_ROT_M_B_NBR,0)))
RefParameter.Description: Formula calculation for TSLPRM_TOTAL_CHANNELS default value.

RefParameter.Name: TSLPRM_TOTAL_CHANNELS_DEFAULT
RefParameter.DefaultValue: =(TSLPRM_TOTAL_TOUCHKEYS + TSLPRM_TOTAL_TOUCHKEYS_B + 3*(IF(TSLPRM_USE_3CH_LIN_M1,TSLPRM_USE_3CH_LIN_M1_NBR + TSLPRM_USE_3CH_LIN_M1_B_NBR,0) + IF(TSLPRM_USE_3CH_LIN_M2,TSLPRM_USE_3CH_LIN_M2_NBR + TSLPRM_USE_3CH_LIN_M2_B_NBR,0) + IF(TSLPRM_USE_3CH_LIN_H,TSLPRM_USE_3CH_LIN_H_NBR + TSLPRM_USE_3CH_LIN_H_B_NBR,0) + IF(TSLPRM_USE_3CH_ROT_M,TSLPRM_USE_3CH_ROT_M_NBR + TSLPRM_USE_3CH_ROT_M_B_NBR,0)) + 4*(IF(TSLPRM_USE_4CH_LIN_M1,TSLPRM_USE_4CH_LIN_M1_NBR + TSLPRM_USE_4CH_LIN_M1_B_NBR,0) + IF(TSLPRM_USE_4CH_LIN_M2,TSLPRM_USE_4CH_LIN_M2_NBR + TSLPRM_USE_4CH_LIN_M2_B_NBR,0) + IF(TSLPRM_USE_4CH_LIN_H,TSLPRM_USE_4CH_LIN_H_NBR + TSLPRM_USE_4CH_LIN_H_B_NBR,0) + IF(TSLPRM_USE_4CH_ROT_M,TSLPRM_USE_4CH_ROT_M_NBR + TSLPRM_USE_4CH_ROT_M_B_NBR,0)) + 5*(IF(TSLPRM_USE_5CH_LIN_M1,TSLPRM_USE_5CH_LIN_M1_NBR + TSLPRM_USE_5CH_LIN_M1_B_NBR,0) + IF(TSLPRM_USE_5CH_LIN_M2,TSLPRM_USE_5CH_LIN_M2_NBR + TSLPRM_USE_5CH_LIN_M2_B_NBR,0) + IF(TSLPRM_USE_5CH_LIN_H,TSLPRM_USE_5CH_LIN_H_NBR + TSLPRM_USE_5CH_LIN_H_B_NBR,0) + IF(TSLPRM_USE_5CH_ROT_M,TSLPRM_USE_5CH_ROT_M_NBR + TSLPRM_USE_5CH_ROT_M_B_NBR,0) + IF(TSLPRM_USE_5CH_ROT_D,TSLPRM_USE_5CH_ROT_D_NBR + TSLPRM_USE_5CH_ROT_D_B_NBR,0)) + 6*(IF(TSLPRM_USE_6CH_LIN_M1,TSLPRM_USE_6CH_LIN_M1_NBR + TSLPRM_USE_6CH_LIN_M1_B_NBR,0) + IF(TSLPRM_USE_6CH_LIN_M2,TSLPRM_USE_6CH_LIN_M2_NBR + TSLPRM_USE_6CH_LIN_M2_B_NBR,0) + IF(TSLPRM_USE_6CH_LIN_H,TSLPRM_USE_6CH_LIN_H_NBR + TSLPRM_USE_6CH_LIN_H_B_NBR,0) + IF(TSLPRM_USE_6CH_ROT_M,TSLPRM_USE_6CH_ROT_M_NBR + TSLPRM_USE_6CH_ROT_M_B_NBR,0)))
RefParameter.Description: Formula calculation for TSLPRM_TOTAL_CHANNELS default value.

RefParameter.Name: TSLPRM_TOTAL_CHANNELS
RefParameter.Description:
Total number of channels in application (range=1..24)
One TouchKey: one channel
One LinRot: 3, 4, 5 or 6 channels depending of selected one
Be aware that if your TSC is not correctly configured, i.e. not enough channels activated then you will get error message because of this.

RefParameter.Name: TSLPRM_TOTAL_CHANNELS
RefParameter.Description:
Total number of channels in application (range=1..34)
One TouchKey: one channel
One LinRot: 3, 4, 5 or 6 channels depending of selected one

RefParameter.Name: TSLPRM_TOTAL_CHANNELS
RefParameter.Description:
Total number of channels in application (range=1..255)
One TouchKey: one channel
One LinRot: 3, 4, 5 or 6 channels depending of selected one

RefParameter.Name: TSLPRM_TOTAL_ALL_TOUCHKEYS
RefParameter.Description: Total number of touchkeys, maximum being nbr of activated channels in TSC IP

RefParameter.Name: TSLPRM_TOTAL_ALL_TOUCHKEYS
RefParameter.Description: Total number of touchkeys, maximum being nbr of activated channels in TS IP

RefParameter.Name: TSC_ACTIVE_CHANNELS
RefParameter.Description:
USER INFORMATION: Total number of channels in application activated on TSC IP
TSLPRM_TOTAL_CHANNELS cannot be higher

RefParameter.Name: TSC_ACTIVE_CHANNELS
RefParameter.Description:
USER INFORMATION: Total number of channels in application activated on TSC IP
TSLPRM_TOTAL_CHANNELS cannot be higher

RefParameter.Name: TSLPRM_TOTAL_TOUCHKEYS_ACTIVE_CHANNELS
RefParameter.DefaultValue: =(TSLPRM_TOTAL_TOUCHKEYS_B + 3*(IF(TSLPRM_USE_3CH_LIN_M1,TSLPRM_USE_3CH_LIN_M1_NBR + TSLPRM_USE_3CH_LIN_M1_B_NBR,0) + IF(TSLPRM_USE_3CH_LIN_M2,TSLPRM_USE_3CH_LIN_M2_NBR + TSLPRM_USE_3CH_LIN_M2_B_NBR,0) + IF(TSLPRM_USE_3CH_LIN_H,TSLPRM_USE_3CH_LIN_H_NBR + TSLPRM_USE_3CH_LIN_H_B_NBR,0) + IF(TSLPRM_USE_3CH_ROT_M,TSLPRM_USE_3CH_ROT_M_NBR + TSLPRM_USE_3CH_ROT_M_B_NBR,0)) + 4*(IF(TSLPRM_USE_4CH_LIN_M1,TSLPRM_USE_4CH_LIN_M1_NBR + TSLPRM_USE_4CH_LIN_M1_B_NBR,0) + IF(TSLPRM_USE_4CH_LIN_M2,TSLPRM_USE_4CH_LIN_M2_NBR + TSLPRM_USE_4CH_LIN_M2_B_NBR,0) + IF(TSLPRM_USE_4CH_LIN_H,TSLPRM_USE_4CH_LIN_H_NBR + TSLPRM_USE_4CH_LIN_H_B_NBR,0) + IF(TSLPRM_USE_4CH_ROT_M,TSLPRM_USE_4CH_ROT_M_NBR + TSLPRM_USE_4CH_ROT_M_B_NBR,0))+ 5*(IF(TSLPRM_USE_5CH_LIN_M1,TSLPRM_USE_5CH_LIN_M1_NBR + TSLPRM_USE_5CH_LIN_M1_B_NBR,0) + IF(TSLPRM_USE_5CH_LIN_M2,TSLPRM_USE_5CH_LIN_M2_NBR + TSLPRM_USE_5CH_LIN_M2_B_NBR,0) + IF(TSLPRM_USE_5CH_LIN_H,TSLPRM_USE_5CH_LIN_H_NBR + TSLPRM_USE_5CH_LIN_H_B_NBR,0) + IF(TSLPRM_USE_5CH_ROT_M,TSLPRM_USE_5CH_ROT_M_NBR + TSLPRM_USE_5CH_ROT_M_B_NBR,0) + IF(TSLPRM_USE_5CH_ROT_D,TSLPRM_USE_5CH_ROT_D_NBR + TSLPRM_USE_5CH_ROT_D_B_NBR,0))+ 6*(IF(TSLPRM_USE_6CH_LIN_M1,TSLPRM_USE_6CH_LIN_M1_NBR + TSLPRM_USE_6CH_LIN_M1_B_NBR,0) + IF(TSLPRM_USE_6CH_LIN_M2,TSLPRM_USE_6CH_LIN_M2_NBR + TSLPRM_USE_6CH_LIN_M2_B_NBR,0) + IF(TSLPRM_USE_6CH_LIN_H,TSLPRM_USE_6CH_LIN_H_NBR + TSLPRM_USE_6CH_LIN_H_B_NBR,0) + IF(TSLPRM_USE_6CH_ROT_M,TSLPRM_USE_6CH_ROT_M_NBR + TSLPRM_USE_6CH_ROT_M_B_NBR,0)))
RefParameter.Description: Formula calculation for TSLPRM_TOTAL_TOUCHKEYS_ACTIVE_CHANNELS default value.

RefParameter.Name: TSLPRM_TOTAL_TOUCHKEYS_MAX
RefParameter.Description: Formula calculation for TSLPRM_TOTAL_TOUCHKEYS_MAX default value.

RefParameter.Description: Formula calculation for TSLPRM_TOTAL_TOUCHKEYS_MAX default value.

RefParameter.Name: TSLPRM_TOTAL_TOUCHKEYS_B_ACTIVE_CHANNELS
RefParameter.DefaultValue: =(TSLPRM_TOTAL_TOUCHKEYS + 3*(IF(TSLPRM_USE_3CH_LIN_M1,TSLPRM_USE_3CH_LIN_M1_NBR + TSLPRM_USE_3CH_LIN_M1_B_NBR,0) + IF(TSLPRM_USE_3CH_LIN_M2,TSLPRM_USE_3CH_LIN_M2_NBR + TSLPRM_USE_3CH_LIN_M2_B_NBR,0) + IF(TSLPRM_USE_3CH_LIN_H,TSLPRM_USE_3CH_LIN_H_NBR + TSLPRM_USE_3CH_LIN_H_B_NBR,0) + IF(TSLPRM_USE_3CH_ROT_M,TSLPRM_USE_3CH_ROT_M_NBR + TSLPRM_USE_3CH_ROT_M_B_NBR,0)) + 4*(IF(TSLPRM_USE_4CH_LIN_M1,TSLPRM_USE_4CH_LIN_M1_NBR + TSLPRM_USE_4CH_LIN_M1_B_NBR,0) + IF(TSLPRM_USE_4CH_LIN_M2,TSLPRM_USE_4CH_LIN_M2_NBR + TSLPRM_USE_4CH_LIN_M2_B_NBR,0) + IF(TSLPRM_USE_4CH_LIN_H,TSLPRM_USE_4CH_LIN_H_NBR + TSLPRM_USE_4CH_LIN_H_B_NBR,0) + IF(TSLPRM_USE_4CH_ROT_M,TSLPRM_USE_4CH_ROT_M_NBR + TSLPRM_USE_4CH_ROT_M_B_NBR,0))+ 5*(IF(TSLPRM_USE_5CH_LIN_M1,TSLPRM_USE_5CH_LIN_M1_NBR + TSLPRM_USE_5CH_LIN_M1_B_NBR,0) + IF(TSLPRM_USE_5CH_LIN_M2,TSLPRM_USE_5CH_LIN_M2_NBR + TSLPRM_USE_5CH_LIN_M2_B_NBR,0) + IF(TSLPRM_USE_5CH_LIN_H,TSLPRM_USE_5CH_LIN_H_NBR + TSLPRM_USE_5CH_LIN_H_B_NBR,0) + IF(TSLPRM_USE_5CH_ROT_M,TSLPRM_USE_5CH_ROT_M_NBR + TSLPRM_USE_5CH_ROT_M_B_NBR,0) + IF(TSLPRM_USE_5CH_ROT_D,TSLPRM_USE_5CH_ROT_D_NBR + TSLPRM_USE_5CH_ROT_D_B_NBR,0))+ 6*(IF(TSLPRM_USE_6CH_LIN_M1,TSLPRM_USE_6CH_LIN_M1_NBR + TSLPRM_USE_6CH_LIN_M1_B_NBR,0) + IF(TSLPRM_USE_6CH_LIN_M2,TSLPRM_USE_6CH_LIN_M2_NBR + TSLPRM_USE_6CH_LIN_M2_B_NBR,0) + IF(TSLPRM_USE_6CH_LIN_H,TSLPRM_USE_6CH_LIN_H_NBR + TSLPRM_USE_6CH_LIN_H_B_NBR,0) + IF(TSLPRM_USE_6CH_ROT_M,TSLPRM_USE_6CH_ROT_M_NBR + TSLPRM_USE_6CH_ROT_M_B_NBR,0)))
RefParameter.Description: Formula calculation for TSLPRM_TOTAL_TOUCHKEYS_B_ACTIVE_CHANNELS default value.

RefParameter.Description: Total number of "Extended" TouchKeys in application

RefParameter.Description: Total number of "Extended" TouchKeys in application

RefParameter.Description: Total number of "Extended" TouchKeys in application (range=0..255)

RefParameter.Name: TSLPRM_USE_3CH_LIN_M1
RefParameter.Description:
Select which Linear and Rotary sensors you use in your application.
Warning: it is recommended to activate IO's in 3 groups of TS/TSC peripheral for optimized performances
- 0 = Not Used
- 1 = Used
LIN = Linear sensor
M1 = Mono electrodes design with 0/255 position at extremities of the sensor

RefParameter.Name: TSLPRM_USE_3CH_LIN_M1_NBR_ACTIVE_CHANNELS
RefParameter.Description: Formula calculation for TSLPRM_USE_3CH_LIN_M1_NBR_ACTIVE_CHANNELS default value.

RefParameter.Name: TSLPRM_USE_3CH_LIN_M2
RefParameter.Description:
Select which Linear and Rotary sensors you use in your application.
Warning: it is recommended to activate IO's in 3 groups of TS/TSC peripheral for optimized performances
- 0 = Not Used
- 1 = Used
LIN = Linear sensor
M2 = Mono electrodes design

RefParameter.Name: TSLPRM_USE_3CH_LIN_M2_NBR_ACTIVE_CHANNELS
RefParameter.Description: Formula calculation for TSLPRM_USE_3CH_LIN_M2_NBR_ACTIVE_CHANNELS default value.

RefParameter.Name: TSLPRM_USE_3CH_LIN_H
RefParameter.Description:
Select which Linear and Rotary sensors you use in your application.
Warning: it is recommended to activate IO's in 3 groups of TS/TSC peripheral for optimized performances
- 0 = Not Used
- 1 = Used
LIN = Linear sensor
H = Half-ended electrodes design

RefParameter.Name: TSLPRM_USE_3CH_LIN_H_NBR_ACTIVE_CHANNELS
RefParameter.Description: Formula calculation for TSLPRM_USE_3CH_LIN_H_NBR_ACTIVE_CHANNELS default value.

RefParameter.Name: TSLPRM_USE_3CH_ROT_M
RefParameter.Description:
Select which Linear and Rotary sensors you use in your application.
Warning: it is recommended to activate IO's in 3 groups of TS/TSC peripheral for optimized performances
- 0 = Not Used
- 1 = Used
ROT = Rotary sensor

RefParameter.Name: TSLPRM_USE_3CH_ROT_M_NBR_ACTIVE_CHANNELS
RefParameter.Description: Formula calculation for TSLPRM_USE_3CH_ROT_M_NBR_ACTIVE_CHANNELS default value.

RefParameter.Name: TSLPRM_USE_4CH_LIN_M1
RefParameter.Description:
Select which Linear and Rotary sensors you use in your application.
Warning: it is recommended to activate IO's in 4 groups of TS/TSC peripheral for optimized performances
- 0 = Not Used
- 1 = Used
LIN = Linear sensor
M1 = Mono electrodes design with 0/255 position at extremities of the sensor

RefParameter.Name: TSLPRM_USE_4CH_LIN_M1_NBR_ACTIVE_CHANNELS
RefParameter.Description: Formula calculation for TSLPRM_USE_4CH_LIN_M1_NBR_ACTIVE_CHANNELS default value.

RefParameter.Name: TSLPRM_USE_4CH_LIN_M2
RefParameter.Description:
Select which Linear and Rotary sensors you use in your application.
Warning: it is recommended to activate IO's in 4 groups of TS/TSC peripheral for optimized performances
- 0 = Not Used
- 1 = Used
LIN = Linear sensor
M2 = Mono electrodes design

RefParameter.Description: Formula calculation for TSLPRM_USE_4CH_LIN_M2_NBR_ACTIVE_CHANNELS default value.

- 0 = Not Used
- 1 = Used
LIN = Linear sensor
H = Half-ended electrodes design

RefParameter.Name: TSC_SHIELDIOs
RefParameter.Description: USER INFORMATION: Refparameter defined by TSC IP

RefParameter.Name: TSC_SHIELDIOs
RefParameter.Description: USER INFORMATION: Refparameter defined by TS IP

RefParameter.Name: TSC_SAMPLINGIOs
RefParameter.Description: USER INFORMATION: Refparameter defined by TSC IP

RefParameter.Name: TSC_SAMPLINGIOs
RefParameter.Description: USER INFORMATION: Refparameter defined by TS IP

RefParameter.Name: TSC_ACTIVE_SHIELDS
RefParameter.Description: USER INFORMATION: Total number of shields in application activated on TSC IP

RefParameter.Name: TSC_ACTIVE_SHIELDS
RefParameter.Description: USER INFORMATION: Total number of shields in application activated on TSC IP

RefParameter.Name: TSC_ACTIVE_SAMPLING
RefParameter.Description: USER INFORMATION: Total number of sampling in application activated on TSC IP

RefParameter.Name: TSC_ACTIVE_SAMPLING
RefParameter.Description: USER INFORMATION: Total number of sampling in application activated on TSC IP

RefParameter.Name: TSLPRM_TOTAL_LINROTS
RefParameter.Description:
Total number of "Extended" Linear and Rotary sensors in application
Count also the 1-channel linear sensor used as TouchKey

RefParameter.Name: TSLPRM_TOTAL_LINROTS
RefParameter.Description:
Total number of "Extended" Linear and Rotary sensors in application
Count also the 1-channel linear sensor used as TouchKey

RefParameter.Name: TSLPRM_TOTAL_LINROTS
RefParameter.Description:
Total number of "Extended" Linear and Rotary sensors in application
Count also the 1-channel linear sensor used as TouchKey

RefParameter.Name: TSLPRM_TOTAL_LINROTS_B
RefParameter.Description:
Total number of "Basic" Linear and Rotary sensors in application
Count also the 1-channel linear sensor used as TouchKey

RefParameter.Name: TSLPRM_TOTAL_LINROTS_B
RefParameter.Description:
Total number of "Basic" Linear and Rotary sensors in application
Count also the 1-channel linear sensor used as TouchKey

RefParameter.Name: TSLPRM_TOTAL_LINROTS_B
RefParameter.Description:
Total number of "Basic" Linear and Rotary sensors in application
Count also the 1-channel linear sensor used as TouchKey

RefParameter.Name: TSLPRM_TOTAL_OBJECTS
RefParameter.Description:
Total number of sensors/objects in application
Count all TouchKeys, Linear and Rotary sensors

RefParameter.Name: TSLPRM_TOTAL_OBJECTS
RefParameter.Description:
Total number of sensors/objects in application
Count all TouchKeys, Linear and Rotary sensors

RefParameter.Name: TSLPRM_TOTAL_OBJECTS
RefParameter.Description:
Total number of sensors/objects in application
Count all TouchKeys, Linear and Rotary sensors

RefParameter.Name: TSLPRM_USE_MEAS
RefParameter.Description:
Record the last measure (0=No, 1=Yes)
If No the measure is recalculated using the Reference and Delta

RefParameter.Name: TSLPRM_ACQ_MIN
RefParameter.Description:
Minimum acquisition measurement (range=0..65535)
This is the minimum acceptable value for the acquisition measure.
The acquisition will be in error IF the measure is below this value.

RefParameter.Name: TSLPRM_ACQ_MAX
RefParameter.Description:
Maximum acquisition measurement (range=0...65535)
This is the maximum acceptable value for the acquisition measure.
The acquisition will be in error IF the measure is above this value.

RefParameter.Name: TSLPRM_ACQ_MAX
RefParameter.Description:
This parameter is set by TSC IP
Maximum acquisition measurement (range=(TSC_MVC)255, 511, 1023, 2047, 8191, 16383)
This is the maximum acceptable value for the acquisition measure.
The acquisition will be in error IF the measure is above this value.

RefParameter.Name: TSLPRM_CALIB_SAMPLES
RefParameter.Description:
Number of calibration samples (range=4, 8, 16)
Low value = faster calibration but less precision.
High value = slower calibration but more precision.

RefParameter.Name: TSLPRM_CALIB_DELAY
RefParameter.Description:
Delay in measurement samples before starting the calibration (range=0..40)
- This is useful IF a noise filter is used.
- Write 0 to disable the delay.

RefParameter.Name: TSLPRM_TKEY_PROX_IN_TH
RefParameter.Description:
TouchKeys Proximity state input threshold (range=0..255)
Enter Proximity state IF delta is above

RefParameter.Name: TSLPRM_TKEY_PROX_OUT_TH
RefParameter.Description:
TouchKeys Proximity state output threshold (range=0..255)
Exit Proximity state IF delta is below

RefParameter.Name: TSLPRM_TKEY_DETECT_IN_TH
RefParameter.Description:
TouchKeys Detect state input threshold (range=0..255)
Enter Detect state IF delta is above

RefParameter.Name: TSLPRM_TKEY_DETECT_IN_TH
RefParameter.Description:
TouchKeys Detect state input threshold (range=0..255)
Enter Detect state IF delta is above

RefParameter.Name: TSLPRM_TKEY_DETECT_OUT_TH
RefParameter.Description:
TouchKeys Detect state output threshold (range=0..255)
Exit Detect state IF delta is below

RefParameter.Name: TSLPRM_TKEY_DETECT_OUT_TH
RefParameter.Description:
TouchKeys Detect state output threshold (range=0..255)
Exit Detect state IF delta is below

RefParameter.Name: TSLPRM_TKEY_CALIB_TH
RefParameter.Description:
TouchKeys re-Calibration threshold (range=0..255)
@warning The value is inverted in the sensor state machine
Enter Calibration state IF delta is below

RefParameter.Name: TSLPRM_TKEY_CALIB_TH
RefParameter.Description:
TouchKeys re-Calibration threshold (range=0..255)
@warning The value is inverted in the sensor state machine
Enter Calibration state IF delta is below

RefParameter.Name: TSLPRM_COEFF_TH
RefParameter.Description:
TouchKey, Linear and Rotary sensors thresholds coefficient (range=0..4)
This multiplier coefficient is applied on Detect and Re-Calibration thresholds only.
0: feature disabled
1: thresholds x 2
2: thresholds x 4
3: thresholds x 8
4: thresholds x 16

RefParameter.Name: TSLPRM_LINROT_PROX_IN_TH
RefParameter.Group: Thresholds for Linear and Rotary sensors
RefParameter.Description:
Linear/Rotary Proximity state input threshold (range=0..255)
Enter Proximity state IF delta is above

RefParameter.Name: TSLPRM_LINROT_PROX_OUT_TH
RefParameter.Group: Thresholds for Linear and Rotary sensors
RefParameter.Description:
Linear/Rotary Proximity state output threshold (range=0..255)
Exit Proximity state IF delta is below

RefParameter.Name: TSLPRM_LINROT_DETECT_IN_TH
RefParameter.Group: Thresholds for Linear and Rotary sensors
RefParameter.Description:
Linear/Rotary Detect state input threshold (range=0..255)
Enter Detect state IF delta is above

RefParameter.Name: TSLPRM_LINROT_DETECT_IN_TH
RefParameter.Group: Thresholds for Linear and Rotary sensors
RefParameter.Description:
Linear/Rotary Detect state input threshold (range=0..255)
Enter Detect state IF delta is above

RefParameter.Name: TSLPRM_LINROT_DETECT_OUT_TH
RefParameter.Group: Thresholds for Linear and Rotary sensors
RefParameter.Description:
Linear/Rotary Detect state output threshold (range=0..255)
Exit Detect state IF delta is below

RefParameter.Name: TSLPRM_LINROT_DETECT_OUT_TH
RefParameter.Group: Thresholds for Linear and Rotary sensors
RefParameter.Description:
Linear/Rotary Detect state output threshold (range=0..255)
Exit Detect state IF delta is below

RefParameter.Name: TSLPRM_LINROT_CALIB_TH
RefParameter.Group: Thresholds for Linear and Rotary sensors
RefParameter.Description:
Linear/Rotary re-Calibration threshold (range=0..255)
@warning The value is inverted in the sensor state machine
Enter Calibration state IF delta is below
A low absolute value will result in a higher sensitivity and thus some spurious, recalibration may be issued.

RefParameter.Name: TSLPRM_LINROT_CALIB_TH
RefParameter.Group: Thresholds for Linear and Rotary sensors
RefParameter.Description:
Linear/Rotary re-Calibration threshold (range=0..255)
@warning The value is inverted in the sensor state machine
Enter Calibration state IF delta is below
A low absolute value will result in a higher sensitivity and thus some spurious, recalibration may be issued.

RefParameter.Name: TSLPRM_LINROT_USE_NORMDELTA
RefParameter.Group: Thresholds for Linear and Rotary sensors
RefParameter.Description:
Linear/Rotary Delta normalization (0=No, 1=Yes)
- When this parameter is set, a coefficient is applied on all Delta of all sensors in order to normalize them and to improve the position calculation.
- These coefficients must be defined in a constant table in the application (see Library examples).
- The MSB is the coefficient integer part, the LSB is the coefficient real part.
- Examples:
- To apply a factor 1.10:
0x01 to the MSB
0x1A to the LSB (0.10 x 256 = 25.6 -> rounded to 26 = 0x1A)
- To apply a factor 0.90:
0x00 to the MSB
0xE6 to the LSB (0.90 x 256 = 230.4 -> rounded to 230 = 0xE6)
- To apply no factor:
0x01 to the MSB
0x00 to the LSB

RefParameter.Name: TSLPRM_LINROT_RESOLUTION
RefParameter.Description:
Position resolution in number of bits (range=1..8)
- A Low value will result in a low resolution and will be less subject to noise.
- A High value will result in a high resolution and will be more subject to noise.

RefParameter.Name: TSLPRM_LINROT_DIR_CHG_POS
RefParameter.Description:
Direction change threshold in position unit (range=0..255)
- Defines the default threshold used during the change direction process.
- A Low value will result in a faster direction change.
- A High value will result in a slower direction change.

RefParameter.Name: TSLPRM_LINROT_DIR_CHG_DEB
RefParameter.Description:
Direction change debounce (range=0..63)
- Defines the default integrator counter used during the change direction process.
- This counter is decremented when the same change in the position is detected and the direction will change after this counter reaches zero.
- A Low value will result in a faster direction change.
- A High value will result in a slower direction change.

RefParameter.Name: TSLPRM_DEBOUNCE_PROX
RefParameter.Description:
Proximity state debounce in samples unit (range=0..63)
- A Low value will result in a higher sensitivity during the Proximity detection but with less noise filtering.
- A High value will result in improving the system noise immunity but will increase the system response time.

RefParameter.Name: TSLPRM_DEBOUNCE_DETECT
RefParameter.Description:
Detect state debounce in samples unit (range=0..63)
- A Low value will result in a higher sensitivity during the detection but with less noise filtering.
- A High value will result in improving the system noise immunity but will increase the system response time.

RefParameter.Name: TSLPRM_DEBOUNCE_RELEASE
RefParameter.Description:
Release state debounce in samples unit (range=0..63)
- A Low value will result in a higher sensitivity during the end-detection but with less noise filtering.
- A High value will result in a lower sensitivity during the end-detection but with more noise filtering.

RefParameter.Name: TSLPRM_DEBOUNCE_CALIB
RefParameter.Description:
Re-calibration state debounce in samples unit (range=0..63)
- A Low value will result in a higher sensitivity during the recalibration but with less noise filtering.
- A High value will result in a lower sensitivity during the recalibration but with more noise filtering.

RefParameter.Name: TSLPRM_DEBOUNCE_ERROR
RefParameter.Description:
Error state debounce in samples unit (range=0..63)
- A Low value will result in a higher sensitivity to enter in error state.
- A High value will result in a lower sensitivity to enter in error state.

RefParameter.Name: TSLPRM_ECS_K_SLOW
RefParameter.Description:
Environment Change System Slow K factor (range=0..255)
- The higher value is K, the faster is the response time.

RefParameter.Name: TSLPRM_ECS_K_FAST
RefParameter.Description:
Environment Change System Fast K factor (range=0..255)
- The higher value is K, the faster is the response time.

RefParameter.Name: TSLPRM_ECS_DELAY
RefParameter.Description:
Environment Change System delay in msec (range=0..5000)
- The ECS will be started after this delay and when all sensors are in Release state.

RefParameter.Name: TSLPRM_DTO
RefParameter.Description:
Detection Time Out delay in seconds (range=0..63)
- Value 0: DTO processing not compiled in the code (to gain size IF not used).
- Value 1: Default time out infinite.
- Value between 2 and 63: Default time out between value n-1 and n.
- Examples:
- With a DTO equal to 2, the time out is between 1s and 2s.
- With a DTO equal to 63, the time out is between 62s and 63s.

@note The DTO can be changed in run-time by the application only IF the default value is between 1 and 63.

RefParameter.Name: TSLPRM_TICK_FREQ
RefParameter.Description:
Timing tick frequency in Hz (range=125, 250, 500, 1000, 2000)
- Result to a timing interrupt respectively every 8ms, 4ms, 2ms, 1ms, 0.5ms

RefParameter.Name: TSLPRM_DELAY_DISCHARGE_ALL
RefParameter.Description:
Delay for discharging Cx and Cs capacitors (range=0..65535)
- The value corresponds to the Softdelay function parameter.
- 500 gives around 63 µs delay whatever HCLK
- 1000 gives around 125 µs delay whatever HCLK
- 2000 gives around 250 µs delay whatever HCLK

RefParameter.Name: TSLPRM_IODEF
RefParameter.Description:
IOs default mode when no on-going acquisition (range=0..1)
- 0: Output push-pull low
- 1: Input floating
@note To ensure a correct operation in noisy environment, this parameter should be configured to output push-pull low (excepted for Linear sensors).

RefParameter.Name: TSLPRM_IODEF
RefParameter.Description:
This parameter is set by TSC IP
IOs default mode when no on-going acquisition (range=0..1)
- 0: Output push-pull low(TSC_IODEF_OUT_PP_LOW)
- 1: Input floating(TSC_IODEF_IN_FLOAT)
@note To ensure a correct operation in noisy environment, this parameter should be configured to output push-pull low (excepted for Linear sensors).

RefParameter.Name: TSLPRM_USE_SHIELD
RefParameter.Description:
Used only with STM32L1
Shield with a channel (0=No, 1=Yes)

RefParameter.Name: TSLPRM_CT_PERIOD
RefParameter.Description: Charge/transfer Period (in µs) (= high pulse + low pulse) @note For HW acquisition only

RefParameter.Name: TSLPRM_CT_PERIOD
RefParameter.Description:
Used only with STM32L1
Charge/transfer Period (in µs) (= high pulse + low pulse) @note For HW acquisition only

RefParameter.Name: TSLPRM_TIMER_FREQ
RefParameter.Description:
Timer frequency (in MHz)
- This is used to calculate the Timer reload value.
@note For HW acquisition only

RefParameter.Name: TSLPRM_TIMER_FREQ
RefParameter.Description:
Used only with STM32L1
Timer frequency (in MHz)
- This is used to calculate the Timer reload value.
@note For HW acquisition only

RefParameter.Name: TSLPRM_DELAY_TRANSFER
RefParameter.Description:
Delay for transfering charges from Cx to Cs capacitor and then discharge Cx (range=0..65535)
- 0: no delay (it takes about 2.8µs for a CT cycle)
- (1..65535): delay (in µs) = 0.75 * TSLPRM_DELAY_TRANSFER + 1
@note for SW acquisition only

RefParameter.Name: TSLPRM_DELAY_TRANSFER
RefParameter.Description:
Used only with STM32L1
Delay for transfering charges from Cx to Cs capacitor and then discharge Cx (range=0..65535)
- 0: no delay (it takes about 2.8µs for a CT cycle)
- (1..65535): delay (in µs) = 0.75 * TSLPRM_DELAY_TRANSFER + 1
@note for SW acquisition only

RefParameter.Name: TSLPRM_USE_SPREAD_SPECTRUM
RefParameter.Description:
Use Spread Spectrum (0=No, 1=Yes)
@note for SW acquisition only

RefParameter.Name: TSLPRM_USE_SPREAD_SPECTRUM
RefParameter.Description:
Used only with STM32L1
Use Spread Spectrum (0=No, 1=Yes)
@note for SW acquisition only

RefParameter.Name: TSLPRM_SPREAD_MIN
RefParameter.Description:
Spread min value (range=0..(TSLPRM_SPREAD_MAX-1))
@note for SW acquisition only

RefParameter.Name: TSLPRM_SPREAD_MIN
RefParameter.Description:
Used only with STM32L1
Spread min value (range=0..(TSLPRM_SPREAD_MAX-1))
@note for SW acquisition only

RefParameter.Name: TSLPRM_SPREAD_MAX
RefParameter.Description:
Spread max value (range=2..255)
@note for SW acquisition only

RefParameter.Name: TSLPRM_SPREAD_MAX
RefParameter.Description:
Used only with STM32L1
Spread max value (range=2..255)
@note for SW acquisition only

RefParameter.Name: TSLPRM_PROTECT_IO_ACCESS
RefParameter.Description:
IT disabling for IO protection (range=0..1)
- 0: IO not protected
- 1: IO protected
@note for SW acquisition only

RefParameter.Name: TSLPRM_PROTECT_IO_ACCESS
RefParameter.Description:
Used only with STM32L1
IT disabling for IO protection (range=0..1)
- 0: IO not protected
- 1: IO protected
@note for SW acquisition only

RefParameter.Name: TSLPRM_USE_GPIOA
RefParameter.Description:
GPIO to be used (range=0..1)
- 0: Not used
- 1: Used
@note for SW acquisition only

RefParameter.Name: TSLPRM_USE_GPIOA
RefParameter.Description:
Used only with STM32L1
GPIO to be used (range=0..1)
- 0: Not used
- 1: Used
@note for SW acquisition only

RefParameter.Name: TSLPRM_USE_GPIOB
RefParameter.Description:
GPIO to be used (range=0..1)
- 0: Not used
- 1: Used
@note for SW acquisition only

RefParameter.Name: TSLPRM_USE_GPIOB

Used only with STM32L1
GPIO to be used (range=0..1)
- 0: Not used
- 1: Used
@note for SW acquisition only

RefParameter.Name: TSLPRM_USE_GPIOC
RefParameter.Description:
GPIO to be used (range=0..1)
- 0: Not used
- 1: Used
@note for SW acquisition only

Used only with STM32L1
GPIO to be used (range=0..1)
- 0: Not used
- 1: Used
@note for SW acquisition only

RefParameter.Name: TSLPRM_USE_GPIOF
RefParameter.Description:
GPIO to be used (range=0..1)
- 0: Not used

Condition.Diagnostic: Active only with TSC/TS IP configured
